hero_image.title: Hero image - CSS Responsywny dla Początkujących
hero_image.description: Minimalistyczna kompozycja z laptopem i tabletami pokazująca responsywne designowanie CSS
hero_image.alt_text: Workspace z laptopem, tabletem i telefonem pokazujący responsywny design CSS na różnych ekranach
hero_image.prompt: Clean minimalist workspace flat lay view, laptop displaying CSS code and responsive design grid, tablet and smartphone showing same website layout adapted to different screen sizes, white wooden desk, yellow notebook, natural daylight from window, muted colors black white gray with yellow accent, professional web development aesthetic, high quality, no people

stock_suggestions.unsplash_query: responsive web design multiple devices mockup
stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean, minimalist, multiple devices showing same website adapted to different screen sizes

section_media.title: Wykres udziału ruchu mobilnego w e-commerce
section_media.description: Wykres kołowy pokazujący podział ruchu: 60% mobile, 35% desktop, 5% tablet
section_media.alt_text: Wykres kołowy ruchu w polskim e-commerce: 60% urządzenia mobilne, 35% desktop, 5% tablety
section_media.prompt: Clean pie chart showing mobile traffic distribution in Polish e-commerce, 60% mobile devices in blue, 35% desktop in gray, 5% tablets in yellow, professional infographic style, minimalist design, clear labels, business colors matching brand guidelines

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Professional pie chart with clear percentages, business color scheme

section_media.title: Screenshot Chrome DevTools - Responsive Testing
section_media.description: Zrzut ekranu narzędzi deweloperskich Chrome z włączonym trybem responsywnym
section_media.alt_text: Chrome DevTools z trybem responsywnym pokazujący testowanie strony na różnych rozdzielczościach
section_media.prompt: Clean screenshot of Chrome Developer Tools with responsive design mode active, showing website layout testing on different screen sizes, device selector dropdown visible, highlighted mobile view, professional browser interface, clear and readable

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean browser interface screenshot, focused on responsive testing features

section_media.title: Infografika - Kluczowe breakpoints CSS
section_media.description: Pionowa infografika pokazująca 4 główne punkty przełamania: 320px, 768px, 1024px, 1200px
section_media.alt_text: Infografika breakpoints CSS: 320px telefony, 768px tablety, 1024px laptopy, 1200px desktopy
section_media.prompt: Vertical infographic showing CSS breakpoints with device icons: 320px smartphone, 768px tablet, 1024px laptop, 1200px desktop. Clean minimalist design, numbered steps, device silhouettes, professional color scheme black white gray with yellow accents, clear typography

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Clean infographic with device icons and pixel measurements, vertical layout

section_media.title: Diagram Flexbox - przed i po
section_media.description: Porównanie układu elementów: tradycyjny float vs Flexbox
section_media.alt_text: Diagram porównujący tradycyjny układ CSS float z nowoczesnym Flexbox layout
section_media.prompt: Split comparison diagram showing traditional CSS float layout versus modern Flexbox layout, before and after style, geometric shapes representing elements, arrows showing alignment and distribution, clean technical illustration, black and gray colors with yellow highlights

stock_suggestions.style_notes: Technical diagram style, before/after comparison, clean geometric shapes

section_media.title: Przykład kodu CSS Grid
section_media.description: Screenshot edytora kodu z przykładem implementacji CSS Grid dla galerii produktów
section_media.alt_text: Kod CSS Grid w edytorze pokazujący tworzenie responsywnej galerii produktów
section_media.prompt: Clean code editor screenshot showing CSS Grid implementation for product gallery, syntax highlighting, dark theme editor like VS Code, grid-template-columns and grid-gap properties visible, professional developer environment, readable font

stock_suggestions.unsplash_query: css code editor grid layout programming
stock_suggestions.style_notes: Dark theme code editor, clean syntax highlighting, focused on CSS Grid properties

section_media.title: Wykres kosztów implementacji responsywności
section_media.description: Wykres słupkowy porównujący koszty: własny programista vs agencja vs freelancer
section_media.alt_text: Wykres porównania kosztów implementacji responsywnego CSS: programista, agencja, freelancer
section_media.prompt: Horizontal bar chart comparing costs of responsive CSS implementation: in-house developer 8000 PLN/month, agency 150-300 PLN/hour, freelancer 80-150 PLN/hour. Professional business chart, blue bars with values, clean minimal design, currency in PLN

stock_suggestions.unsplash_query: business costs comparison chart bar graph
stock_suggestions.style_notes: Professional horizontal bar chart, clear cost comparisons in PLN currency
